application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 10B (sustainable drainage scheme) of planning permission 22/03827/FUL (Variation of Condition Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 22/01658/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 19/03167/FUL (Demolition of the two existing dwellinghouses and the erection of a part three storey, part two storey nursing home comprising 67 bedrooms with associated car parking, landscaping, refuse and bicycle store)  dated:17/12/2019. Variation to include amendments to create an extension to the rear of the property at ground and first floor Level) to create an extension to the second floor to create a link between the two main building forms. Changes to 2 no. bedroom windows to provide external doors and access to the external amenity space.)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 10B (sustainable drainage scheme) of planning permission 22/03827/FUL. The applicant has not demonstrated that drainage prevents the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with Policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and Policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
